name: RetrieveProjectsList
description:
Retrieve the list of user's or team's projects.

This tool fetches the list of projects associated with the authenticated user or team. It supports pagination and allows filtering through query parameters.

parameters.name: updated_after
parameters.description: Filter projects updated after the specified timestamp or using a continuation token.

value_schema.description: Query only projects updated after the given timestamp or continuation token.

parameters.name: require_git_fork_authorization
parameters.description: Set to '1' to require authorization for Git fork PRs before deployment, or '0' to disable.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether PRs from Git forks should require a team member's authorization before it can be deployed

parameters.name: max_projects_returned
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of projects to return in the list.

value_schema.description: Limit the number of projects returned

parameters.name: search_by_project_name
parameters.description: Search for projects using a keyword or term in the name field.

value_schema.description: Search projects by the name field

parameters.name: filter_by_repo
parameters.description: Filter the project results by the specified repository name, also used for project count.

value_schema.description: Filter results by repo. Also used for project count

parameters.name: filter_by_repository_id
parameters.description: Filter the project results by specifying the Repository ID.

value_schema.description: Filter results by Repository ID.

parameters.name: repository_url_filter
parameters.description: URL to filter projects associated with a specific repository.

value_schema.description: Filter results by Repository URL.

parameters.name: exclude_repositories
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of repository names to exclude from the results.

value_schema.description: Filter results by excluding those projects that belong to a repo

parameters.name: filter_by_edge_config_id
parameters.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config ID. Provide the ID as a string to retrieve projects linked to this specific config.

value_schema.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config ID

parameters.name: filter_by_edge_config_token_id
parameters.description: Filter results by the connected Edge Config Token ID. Provide the specific token ID to refine project search.

value_schema.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config Token ID

parameters.name: filter_by_elastic_concurrency
parameters.description: Filter projects by elastic concurrency status. Use '1' for enabled or '0' for disabled.

value_schema.description: Filter results by projects with elastic concurrency enabled

parameters.name: filter_by_static_ips_enabled
parameters.description: Set to '1' to filter projects with Static IPs enabled, '0' otherwise.

value_schema.description: Filter results by projects with Static IPs enabled

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The team slug to perform the request on behalf of, representing a specific team within Vercel.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: include_deprecated_projects
parameters.description: Include deprecated projects in the results when set to True.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Query only projects updated after the given timestamp or continuation token.

value_schema.description: Query only projects updated after the given timestamp or continuation token.

parameters.name: gitForkProtection
parameters.description: Specifies whether PRs from Git forks should require a team member's authorization before it can be deployed

value_schema.description: Specifies whether PRs from Git forks should require a team member's authorization before it can be deployed

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of projects returned

value_schema.description: Limit the number of projects returned

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search projects by the name field

value_schema.description: Search projects by the name field

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: Filter results by repo. Also used for project count

value_schema.description: Filter results by repo. Also used for project count

parameters.name: repoId
parameters.description: Filter results by Repository ID.

value_schema.description: Filter results by Repository ID.

parameters.name: repoUrl
parameters.description: Filter results by Repository URL.

value_schema.description: Filter results by Repository URL.

parameters.name: excludeRepos
parameters.description: Filter results by excluding those projects that belong to a repo

value_schema.description: Filter results by excluding those projects that belong to a repo

parameters.name: edgeConfigId
parameters.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config ID

value_schema.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config ID

parameters.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config Token ID

value_schema.description: Filter results by connected Edge Config Token ID

parameters.name: elasticConcurrencyEnabled
parameters.description: Filter results by projects with elastic concurrency enabled

value_schema.description: Filter results by projects with elastic concurrency enabled

parameters.name: staticIpsEnabled
parameters.description: Filter results by projects with Static IPs enabled

value_schema.description: Filter results by projects with Static IPs enabled

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
